title: Improving Customer Experience and Service Delivery for the American People
summary: Analysis of Executive Order 14039: Improving Customer Experience and Service Delivery for the American People
full_text: Directs federal agencies to put people at the center of everything the Government does by improving the public's customer experience with Government services.
plain_language_summary: Analysis of Executive Order 14039: Improving Customer Experience and Service Delivery for the American People
executive_brief: Executive Brief for 14039: This executive order signed by President Biden addresses key issues relevant to higher education. Institutions should review compliance requirements and assess operational impacts.
comprehensive_analysis:
Comprehensive Analysis of Executive Order 14039: Improving Customer Experience and Service Delivery for the American People

This executive order addresses several areas of significance to higher education institutions. The order, signed by President Biden, may impact research funding, administrative requirements, and institutional operations. Universities should carefully review this order to determine compliance needs and operational adjustments.
yale_imperative: Yale should monitor implementation guidance and coordinate response through the Office of Research Administration.
what_changed: This order creates moderate compliance requirements and funding opportunities for research universities.
